(Simplified: 骛)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: A horse 馬 working hard 敄; 敄 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 敄 [ wù ] to put forth effort
    • 馬 [ mǎ ] horse; surname
①亂跑，奔馳：騖望(放眼遠望)。騖驟(急速，急驟)。
②同“務”。
騖遠 [ wù yuǎn ]: overambitious

Original meaning 本义: Meaning gallop but no direction.

騖字的基本解释

騖
wù
见“骛”。

騖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wù］
［《廣韻》亡遇切，去遇，微。］
“骛1”的繁体字。
(1)乱驰。
(2)疾速行进；驰骋。
(3)追求；追逐。
(4)犹传扬。
(5)用同“鶩”。鸭子。

騖字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　騖； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1441第17
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?亡遇切，音務。【玉篇】奔也，疾也。【漢書·音義】直騁曰馳，亂馳曰騖。【爾雅·釋詁】騖，務强也。【疏】騖謂馳騖，務謂事務，二者皆以力勉强。【張衡·東京賦】仁風衍而外流，誼方激而遐騖。　又叶莫宥切，音茂。【陸雲詩】巍巍先基，重規絫構。赫赫重光，遐風激騖。

騖字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wù］
["Guangyun" death meets cutting, going to meet, micro. ]
"骛1" in traditional characters.
(1) Chaos.
(2) Go fast; gallop.
(3) Pursuit; chase.
(4) Still spread.
(5) Use the same as "鹜". duck.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　媛; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1441 Page 17
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Death meets death, music affairs. 【Jade articles】Ben Ye, disease also. [Han Shu·Sound and Meaning] Straight forward is called Chi, while chaotic is called Chi. 【Erya·Shiguo】Go, work hard. [Sparse] It is a gallop, and it is a business, both of which are reluctant. [Zhang Heng·Tokyo Fu] Benevolence and wind spread out, and friendship is intense and gaze.　 Ye Moyou cut again, Yinmao. [Lu Yun Poems] Weiwei Xianji, re-regulation and construction. The light is heavy, and the wind is exciting.
